name: Nuevo Paraíso
declaringWar: First the native soil than anything else. Our life is nothing more than the heritage of our country,so my people, Let's put fear behind our backs and save the homeland
attacked: If the toad jumps and sticks in the stake, whose fault is it, the stake or the toad?
defeated: Paradisians! My last Wish is for the happiness of the patria. If my dead contributes to the end of partisanship and the consolidation of union, I shall be lowered in peace into my grave.
afterPeace: As a wise man once said: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind.
introduction: Welcome to the last paradise on earth
uniqueName: United we stand, divided we fall

name: Arkadia
startIntroPart1: This is our home now. We built this from nothing with our bare hands! Our dead are buried behind that wall, in this ground. Our ground! Some earthlings think they can take that away? They think that because we came from the sky we don’t belong here! But they have yet to realize one very important fact. We are on the ground now. And that means *we* are earthlings!.
startIntroPart2: Tonight, we celebrate our newfound peace. Tomorrow, we plan our war.
declaringWar: There are people worth saving. Just not you.
attacked: What you did tonight will haunt you until the end of your days.
afterPeace: If the two of us can get along, then perhaps there’s hope.
defeated: Somehow we allowed justice to become vengeance and vengeance to become sport, and I allowed that, that darkness to rise… but my complicity ends today.
neutralHello: Even with all its faults, Earth is really beautiful.
hateHello: You’re watching us, but you haven’t seen a thing.
tradeRequest: If we stick together, I give you my word. We won’t just survive. We’ll thrive.
uniques: +15% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities
